entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY ENDED, Mine Centre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.0°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 30 December 2022
